label: Menologion. For the month of Kanun I (December)

work_wit.alt_title: Menologion. Lives of Saints for the month of Kanun I (December)
note: Menologion. Lives of Saints for the month of Kanun I (December), beginning on the 5th with St. Sabas and ending on the 13th with the martyrdom of SS. Eustratius, Auxentius, Eugenius, Orestes and Mardarius
